Dictionary.Name: The Collaborative International Dictionary of English v.0.44

Definition.WordDefinition: Mater \Ma"ter\, n. [L., mother. See {Mother}.] See {Alma mater}, {Dura mater}, and {Pia mater}. [1913 Webster]
mater n : informal terms for a mother [syn: {ma}, {mama}, {mamma}, {mom}, {momma}, {mommy}, {mammy}, {mum}, {mummy}]
